name: Noise Picker
description:
Welcome to Noise Picker!

This is a game about noise-canceling (not really)

Please consider downloading the Win build below for a better audio experience.

The game is made for Trijam #125 (https://itch.io/jam/trijam-125). GEEZ! 3 hours are just too tense so I failed DX

I'm more of a programmer, but I also did the visuals and music by myself this time. It costs me about 4.5 hours to finish this one. I'll try harder next time! 

Instructions:

1.Move your mouse so you can hear the NOISE within all the signals.

2.Click on the ONLY ONE NOISE signal to kill it. (You should avoid clicking on other signals).

3.You can always use Right Mouseclick to restart the game.

What's else

Clicking might not be very accurate. Didn't have time to fix that.

HTML5 is a disaster on audio spatial blend.

Have fun!
